summary: Completed comprehensive testing of RoomOps multi-tenant hotel management platform. Backend APIs are fully functional (100% pass rate), but frontend has integration issues with room creation causing React runtime errors.

ui_bugs.issue: Room creation form causes 422 validation error and React runtime errors

integration_issues.issue: Frontend sends incomplete data to backend causing 422 validation errors
Uncaught runtime errors causing error boundary to trigger

action_item_for_main_agent: Fix frontend room creation form validation - the frontend is not sending all required fields (tenant_id, id, created_at) to the backend API. The Pydantic models expect these fields but the frontend form only collects user input fields. Either update the frontend to send dummy values for auto-generated fields, or modify the backend to use separate request/response models.
